    addItemToInventory(Item) - Method in class Entities.Hero

    Adventure - package Adventure
     
    applyEffect(NPC) - Method in class Items.CombatConsumable
    Applies the ongoing effect of the consumable to an enemy.
    applyStrikethrough(String) - Static method in class Adventure.Tools
    Applies a strikethrough effect to the provided text using Unicode characters.
    applyWeaponEffect(NPC) - Method in class Items.MainWeapon
    Applies the weapon's special effect to the specified enemy.
    Archer - Class in Entities
    The Archer class represents an archer character in the game.
    Archer(Archer) - Constructor for class Entities.Archer
    Copy constructor for creating a new Archer instance that is a copy of another Archer to use when the user wants to play again with same character.
    Archer(String, int, int, int, MainWeapon) - Constructor for class Entities.Archer
    Constructs a new Archer with the specified attributes.
    Ascii - Class in Adventure
    The Ascii class provides functionality for displaying ASCII art from text files.
    Ascii() - Constructor for class Adventure.Ascii
     
    Audio - Class in Adventure
    The Audio class provides functionality for playing audio files within the Adventure game.
